doc.field: Italian President Francesco Cossiga asked veteran Christian Democrat politician Giulio Andreotti to try to form a new government, officials said. They said Andreotti had reserved his reply on whether to accept the mandate, normal procedure until he has ascertained whether he can form a government. Cossiga nominated Andreotti, sole candidate of the majority Christian Democrats, despite stiff opposition from the Socialists of outgoing Prime Minister Bettino Craxi. REUTER
